attributes.action: immediately set up a referendum of the taxpaying people of this country to ask them if they are prepared to continue to pay for the medical treatment of 'thousands of young teenage girls' who are hospitalised as a result of binge drinking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As far as I am concerned these 'young teenage girls' are self inflicting and have no entitlement at all to being treated at my expense.  If the taxpaying public are given an opportunity they will also prove to the administration that NHS money is NOT to be expended on these people.
